data.text: @raventbrunner aint nothing gonna fix Wonka or that animated dog movie.
@itmeolliev Maybe that scared them into wanting to make the movies better 💀
@raventbrunner Weird timing too. It would be one thing if numbers were showing that audiences aren't going to the theater, but The Batman just had a ridiculously successful opening weekend.

CORRECTION: SHAZAM 2 IS MOVING UP AND I CANT READ 

from mid 2023 ➡️ Dec. 2022
@raventbrunner When such bad news comes I have this nervous tick of re-reading over and over as if it’s gonna change
@itmeolliev i honestly know nothing about any of these movies but Wonka, I just hate delays!!!
@j2tiger well I’m glad YOU know how to read
@raventbrunner The only one I'm bummed about is Black Adam but yeah, pushing everything back definitely triggered me
@raventbrunner Well technically they moved up Shazam 2
